changeSet.author: gelli

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cvterm WHERE cvterm_id = 10185 AND name = 'X'

changeSet.comment: Create cvterm for X-Non Replicated check entry
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cvterm (cvterm_id, cv_id, name, definition, dbxref_id, is_obsolete, is_relationshiptype) VALUES (10185,2050,'X','Non Replicated Entry',NULL,0,0);

changeSet.author: gelli

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cvterm_relationship WHERE object_id = 10185 AND subject_id = 17269 AND type_id = 1190

changeSet.comment: Create cvterm_relationship for Non Replicate check entry. Value of Categorical ENTRY_TYPE
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cvterm_relationship (type_id, subject_id, object_id) VALUES (1190, 17269, 10185);
